ygData.subject: Re: Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh thanks, I was expecting an answer like, Due a not-a-bug if you bellow some mob to death, you will forever be on its aggro list, even after it dies...
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh thanks, I was expecting an answer like, "Due a "not-a-bug" if you
bellow some mob to death, you will forever be on its aggro list, even
after it dies..."

Heh I even tried to Bellow that TarantualaSaurus (the REALLY big spider
in S RO) to death. (Considering real life fear of spiders, I would be
terrified to zone into S Ro again) I was on a kiting high after my first
kiting experience. (A Dervsih Thug who aggroed on us after killing
another group). Heh, that was fun :) Tryinbg to explain what I was
doing to my newbie Shaman partner "Just sit and the camp and Med! I'll
run by with the derv soon, and you need to heal me"
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
